repocribro-file
===============

|license|

Repocribro-file is extension for `Repocribro`_ web application adding
functionality to gather information from specified file in repositories.
It works similar to ``.travis.yml`` file but just working with the content,
not running any scripts and tests.

.. _Repocribro: https://github.com/MarekSuchanek/repocribro
.. _LICENSE: LICENSE

.. |license| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg
    :alt: License
    :target: LICENSE
